    level="1"
    right="Item 22"

>
[Kortos Diamond](/Equipment.aspx?ID=675)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Artifact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=253" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet](/Sources.aspx?ID=36) pg. 68

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The hilt of this _+3 [major striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [axiomatic](/Equipment.aspx?ID=291) [spell-storing](/Equipment.aspx?ID=305) [longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31)_ is simple and elegant. The blade itself is made of throneglass—a clear, jewellike crafting material with a razor-sharp edge, capable of absorbing psychic magic and redirecting it at the wielder's enemies. Whenever the _Kortos Diamond_ is in an area of dim or brighter light, it glows faintly, as if reflecting the light of a setting sun.

 While wielding the Kortos Diamond, you gain a +2 item bonus on saving throws against [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) effects. You can never harm yourself with the Kortos Diamond, even if [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5).

 If you ever travel farther than 100 miles from the Isle of Kortos while in possession of the _Kortos Diamond_, the sword becomes impossibly heavy; you are [encumbered](/Conditions.aspx?ID=12) as long as you carry the sword and remain outside of this area. If you relinquish the _Kortos Diamond_ while away from Kortos, the sword gradually makes its way back to the isle over the course of a year.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> Interact;     **Effect** You attempt a melee Strike with the _Kortos Diamond_ against a creature within reach. On a hit, you deal damage as normal and the target's mind is inflicted with a powerful disruptive energy. When the creature attempts to Cast a Spell, it must attempt a DC 44 Will save; on a failure, the spell fails and both the spell and the actions spent to cast it are lost. This effect lasts for up to 1 minute.

**Activate** <actions string="Free Action" /> envision;  **Frequency** once per round; **Trigger** You damage an [aberration](/Traits.aspx?ID=1) with the _Kortos Diamond_;  **Effect** You deal an additional 2d8 force damage to the struck creature.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> command, Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You hold the _Kortos Diamond_ aloft and proclaim your might in a booming voice. You cast [_overwhelming presence_](/Spells.aspx?ID=212) (DC 42).

**Destruction** A deity who ascended to divinity via the Test of the Starstone can damage and destroy the _Kortos Diamond_ as if it were not an artifact.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
